DISPLACEMENT_VECTOR.VISUAL_MAPPING: Sets the 3D scale and geometry of the particle/planet mesh. (A=X-Scale, B=Y-Scale, C=Z-Scale).

FIELD_MAGNITUDE.VISUAL_MAPPING: Renders the intensity and density of the surrounding magnetic field/gravitational flux. (FTL readiness).

STRUCTURAL_PREDICTION.VISUAL_MAPPING: Displayed as the objective score (Reward Signal). The AI learns to maximize this value for stability.

RL_REWARD_SIGNAL_RULES.REWARD_MAX_SYMMETRY: Maximize stability: Target A=B=C in final state.
RL_REWARD_SIGNAL_RULES.PENALTY_DIMENSIONAL_SHIFT: Severe penalty if Quaternion Magnitude > 10.0 occurs unexpectedly (FTL Chaos).
RL_REWARD_SIGNAL_RULES.CORE_GOAL: The AI must learn the correct K-factor proportionality to bring the SEU prediction down to the actual observed reality.
